alert.note: Alert for North Sioux (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 31 at 9:18PM CDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Sioux and east central Niobrara Counties through 900 PM MDT... At 818 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 13 miles south of Redbird, or 24 miles northeast of Lusk, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of northwestern Sioux and east central Niobrara Counties. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
